summary: This appears to be an email or communication header regarding a medical emergency at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell. The document references a communication technician at the US Department of Justice.

persons.name: Erna'ling
persons.context: Appears as the sender or recipient of the communication regarding a medical emergency at MCC New York.

events.title: Medical Emergency at MCC New York
events.description: A medical emergency occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, referenced in a communication from a DOJ technician.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his jail cell.
It references a 'Medical Emergency' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The communication involves a US Department of Justice Communication Technician.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting it relates to the circumstances of his death.
